title: Help! the toolbar appeared in game
body: soo idk if think i did press anything but toolbar randomly is in my games, and if i am in game and press it i gets my out of the game. its super annoying. HELP ?! windows 10

replies.body: It sounds like the focus window of your pc is changing somehow, possibly from hitting alt+tab or something. You should be able to keep it from popping up by not switching windows.
